problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是半径为5的⊙O的一条弦,且AB=8,若P是AB的中点,则OP的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O with radius N_0, and AB = N_1, if P is the midpoint of AB, then the length of OP is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连接OB,∵P是AB的中点,AB=8,∴PB=4,∵OP过圆心,∴OP⊥AB,在Rt△BOP中,∵OB=5,PB=4,∴OP=√{OB²-PB²}=√{5²-4²}=3．
